required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

brief_summary.textblock: This study will assess and evaluate conference attendance feasibility and will gather feedback about preferences and barriers to attendance at the American Society for Nutrition annual conference.

detailed_description.textblock: This study will use a survey provided on the American Society for Nutrition Family Support Grant application webpage for those who are registering to attend the American Society for Nutrition annual meeting and who are applying for this particular grant. The survey will take about 10 minutes to complete and will provide detailed information for assessment and evaluation of conference attendance feasibility and will also provide feedback about preferences and barriers related to attendance and this annual meeting.

primary_outcome.measure: Participant likelihood of attendance to the American Society for Nutrition annual meeting if provided with a family support grant

secondary_outcome.measure: Grant option most likely to be used by participants
secondary_outcome.description: 4 options provided for participants to select. This will be tallied to determine which of the four options were most likely to be pursued.

secondary_outcome.measure: Participants' opinion of greatest value of a family support grant should it be provided
secondary_outcome.description: Participants will be asked to describe the greatest value of the family grant support. Potentially the top 7 selections will be recorded.

secondary_outcome.measure: Participants' greatest barrier to attending the American Society for Nutrition annual meeting
secondary_outcome.description: Participants will be asked to describe the greatest barrier to attending the American Society for Nutrition annual meeting. Potentially the top 10 selections will be recorded.

secondary_outcome.measure: Most significant factor influencing the participant's decision to attend the American Society for Nutrition annual meeting
secondary_outcome.description: Participants will be asked to describe the most significant factor influencing the participant's decision to attend the American Society for Nutrition annual meeting. Potentially the top 10 selections will be recorded.

arm_group.description: Participants include applicants for the Family Support Grants that will be provided for the American Society for Nutrition annual meeting who are willing to complete the applicant survey.

intervention.description: This survey will ask a few brief demographic questions and will assess feedback from participants about preferences and barriers to conference attendance.

study_pop.textblock: Applicants for the Family Support Grant to the American Society for Nutrition annual conference that takes place in June 2018

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Must be an applicant for the Family Support Grant to the American Society for Nutrition annual conference that takes place in June 2018
Exclusion Criteria:
